main event: A bright, bluish light object was observed in the West Indies, exhibiting characteristics resembling a brilliant meteor.
interesting points: The object was reported to be several times brighter than Venus,The object emitted a strong bluish light along with small balls of fire and smoke,The sighting lasted approximately 4 minutes,The object was possibly related to missile tests conducted from Cape Canaveral,Multiple witnesses reported similar sightings of the object and its behavior.
witness description: Observers including civilians on ships and land in the Caribbean region
